item.title: Mode Control Panel Selectors – Selector Push Functions – HDG SEL

note.para: Rotational function of these selectors must be operative.

numlitem.para: Use Heading Hold, or LNAV modes. APP, LOC, or B/CRS once established will be operative.

placard.para: Placard HDG SEL switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
